content: pattern now also available on my blog ducks and rabbits 1 this simple mitt pattern with a thumb gusset is knit the same for both hands it uses 2x2 rib cuffs and plain stockinette stitch to show off the lovely self-striping colours of the yarn it would work well with other worsted-weight self-striping variegated or solid yarns with a similar gauge to the lincraft prism such as patons sws while this pattern is written to be knit using the magic loop method or 2 circulars it could also be knit on double pointed needles by dividing the stitches equally amongst 3-4 needles they can easily be knit 2-at-a-time 1 http //ducksandrabbits blogspot com/2010/06/knitting-pattern-magic-mitts html
